overview: The memories of Finn and Frankie meander gently along their North East coast. In still, lingering moments, the lads sip rum and coke from plastic two-litre bottles. They laugh and reminisce about past times together, and find magnificence in the most beautifully mundane of places. As the drink goes down with the sun, bigger questions are revealed with the moon. Finn and Frankie long for these times to last an eternity, without realising that the world has already passed them by.
title: Still Waters
